data.lyric:
[ti:Lose You To Love Me]
[ar:Selena Gomez]
[al:Lose You To Love Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lose You To Love Me - Selena Gomez (赛琳娜·戈麦斯)
[00:03.37]Lyrics by：Selena Gomez/Julia Michaels/Justin Tranter/Mattias Larsson/Robin Fredriksson
[00:06.75]Composed by：Selena Gomez/Julia Michaels/Justin Tranter/Mattias Larsson/Robin Fredriksson
[00:10.13]You promised the world and I fell for it
[00:14.93]I put you first and you adored it
[00:17.44]Set fires to my forest
[00:20.56]And you let it burn
[00:21.95]Sang off key in my chorus
[00:25.26]'Cause it wasn't yours
[00:28.91]I saw the signs and I ignored it
[00:33.48]Rose-colored glasses all distorted
[00:36.04]Set fires to my purpose
[00:39.12]And I let it burn
[00:40.58]You got off on the hurting
[00:43.72]When it wasn't yours
[00:46.47]Yeah
[00:47.86]We'd always go into it blindly
[00:52.54]I needed to lose you to find me
[00:57.10]This dancing was killing me softly
[01:01.85]I needed to hate you to love me yeah
[01:06.15]To love love yeah
[01:07.87]To love love yeah
[01:09.61]To love yeah
[01:11.19]I needed to lose you to love me yeah
[01:15.43]To love love yeah
[01:17.16]To love love yeah
[01:18.90]To love yeah
[01:20.56]I needed to lose you to love me
[01:24.78]I gave my all and they all know it
[01:29.34]You turned me down and now it's showing
[01:32.10]In two months you replaced us
[01:35.26]Like it was easy
[01:36.50]Made me think I deserved it
[01:39.87]In the thick of healing
[01:42.43]Yeah
[01:43.78]We'd always go into it blindly
[01:48.48]I needed to lose you to find me
[01:53.05]This dancing was killing me softly
[01:57.74]I needed to hate you to love me yeah
[02:02.02]To love love yeah
[02:03.75]To love love yeah
[02:05.50]To love yeah
[02:07.06]I needed to lose you to love me yeah
[02:11.35]To love love yeah
[02:13.01]To love love yeah
[02:14.83]To love yeah
[02:16.45]I needed to lose you to love me
[02:20.70]You promised the world and I fell for it
[02:25.40]I put you first and you adored it
[02:27.87]Set fires to my forest
[02:31.04]And you let it burn
[02:32.34]Sang off key in my chorus
[02:39.28]To love love yeah
[02:40.96]To love love yeah
[02:42.77]To love yeah
[02:44.34]I needed to hate you to love me yeah
[02:48.60]To love love yeah
[02:50.29]To love love yeah
[02:52.08]To love yeah
[02:53.67]I needed to lose you to love me
[02:57.95]To love love yeah
[02:59.67]To love love yeah
[03:01.38]To love yeah
[03:02.67]And now the chapter is closed and done
[03:07.40]To love love yeah
[03:08.97]To love love yeah
[03:10.70]To love yeah
[03:12.13]And now it's goodbye
[03:14.42]It's goodbye for us
data.trans:
[ti:Lose You To Love Me]
[ar:Selena Gomez]
[al:Lose You To Love Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.37]//
[00:06.75]//
[00:10.13]曾经你的海誓山盟 我义无反顾的沦陷
[00:14.93]我曾视你为无可取代 而你也乐在其中
[00:17.44]将我的秘密丛林付之一炬
[00:20.56]任其焚毁殆尽
[00:21.95]任我的歌声跑调走样
[00:25.26]只因 你不再专属于我
[00:28.91]其实早有征兆 只是我选择视而不见
[00:33.48]那副玫瑰色眼镜下 一切已失真变形
[00:36.04]将我仅存的幻想付之一炬
[00:39.12]任其焚毁殆尽
[00:40.58]你遍体鳞伤 决然离去
[00:43.72]而你 不再专属于我
[00:46.47]//
[00:47.86]我们总是不顾一切 顾自执着
[00:52.54]我需要放弃对你的眷恋 只为找回自我
[00:57.10]这洒脱的舞步让我备受煎熬
[01:01.85]对于你的爱 我该报以恨吧
[01:06.15]爱啊 爱啊
[01:07.87]爱啊 爱啊
[01:09.61]爱啊
[01:11.19]我该放手让你走 好好爱自己
[01:15.43]爱啊 爱啊
[01:17.16]爱啊 爱啊
[01:18.90]爱啊
[01:20.56]我该放手让你走 好好爱自己
[01:24.78]众所周知 我曾付出所有
[01:29.34]是你让我感受撕心裂肺的滋味
[01:32.10]只是短短两个月 我的一切全被取代
[01:35.26]似乎轻而易举
[01:36.50]让我感觉这结局 是我咎由自取
[01:39.87]漫长的治愈之旅
[01:42.43]//
[01:43.78]我们总是不顾一切 顾自执着
[01:48.48]我需要放弃对你的眷恋 只为找回自我
[01:53.05]这洒脱的舞步让我备受煎熬
[01:57.74]对于你的爱 我该报以恨吧
[02:02.02]爱啊 爱啊

[02:05.50]爱啊

[02:13.01]爱啊 爱啊
[02:14.83]爱啊
[02:16.45]我该放手让你走 好好爱自己
[02:20.70]曾经你的海誓山盟 我义无反顾的沦陷
[02:25.40]我曾视你为无可取代 而你也乐在其中
[02:27.87]将我的秘密丛林付之一炬
[02:31.04]任其焚毁殆尽
[02:32.34]任我的歌声跑调走样
[02:39.28]爱啊 爱啊
[02:40.96]爱啊 爱啊
[02:42.77]爱啊
[02:44.34]对于你的爱 我该报以恨吧
[02:48.60]爱啊 爱啊
[02:50.29]爱啊 爱啊
[02:52.08]爱啊
[02:53.67]我该放手让你走 好好爱自己
[02:57.95]爱啊 爱啊
[02:59.67]爱啊 爱啊
[03:01.38]爱啊
[03:02.67]如今属于我们的故事已画上完结句点
[03:07.40]爱啊 爱啊
[03:08.97]爱啊 爱啊
[03:10.70]爱啊
[03:12.13]现在是该挥手道别了
[03:14.42]挥手告别曾经的我们
